item.title: Petco confirms security lapse exposed customers’ personal data
item.description: The pet company has published almost no details about what happened, who was affected, and what personal data was exposed.

item.title: Netflix to acquire Warner Bros. in a disruptive deal valued at $82.7B
item.description: In one of the most groundbreaking deals the streaming world has ever seen, Netflix acquires Warner Bros. for $82.7 billion.
